title: Interpretation of a dream about hugging in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of a hug by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi The dream of a hug is one of the dreams of many people. It is considered a comfortable dream in which one does not feel any pressure due to the hug or the like. An invited hug is one of the things that most expresses warmth, tenderness and love, as we find any expatriate upon his return, all his family, friends and loved ones meet him with hugs, and if a person travels they bid him farewell with a hug as an expression of the extent of love and longing, and many people see that someone is hugging them and through this article we will learn about it. On the interpretation of dreams about hugs in a dream about Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about hugs in a dream A hug in dreams means many things, depending on the event in which the hug occurs. Of course, interpretations of hugs in a dream may follow the romantic path. The interpretation of a dream about a hug in a dream is as follows: Seeing a hug in a dream symbolizes the noble feelings and sincere love that the viewer feels for the other party and attraction to him. It is the act of lovers that indicates excessive longing, inexhaustible love, and the desire to meet. The vision indicates excessive thinking about The emotional relationship and the desire to succeed and achieve advanced stages in it. Embracing in a dream symbolizes activity, vitality, and positive energy that passes through all aspects of the body and the desire to live in a calm and happy spirit. Seeing an embrace is an indication that the relationship between the two parties is going well and that a state of satisfaction Emotional control controls them and makes them more attractive to each other. To see an embrace accompanied by hot crying is a sign of separation or farewell that the dreamer hopes to return to again. The vision also symbolizes the tendency to accompany the other party, talk to him, share his joys and sorrows, and stay with them for life. See also : Interpretation of dreams about an accident in a dream for single, pregnant, and married women. Interpretation of an embrace in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that whoever hugs a living person in a dream will share life with him as long as the embrace continues. If he hugs a dead person, his life will be prolonged, and whoever hugs a dead person will die. Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a hug symbolizes the unification of souls, rising to the top, attaining prestige, and achieving the goal, even if the means are not available. He points out that measuring the duration and continuity of the relationship depends on the viewer’s vision of himself during the hug. Or an embrace. If he sees that he is embracing his beloved for a long time, this is a sign of the continuation of the relationship and the fulfillment of the covenant. But if the embrace is short, then this is an indication of what does not last long, and what is tainted by worldly influences does not last. It is also believed that a woman’s breasts in a dream do not portend evil Rather, it symbolizes connection to the ends of the world and not thinking about the afterlife. See also: Interpretation of dreams about an accident in a dream for single, pregnant, and married women. Interpretation of hugging in a dream about phenomena. Whoever believes that he is embracing someone will win in life. It was said: Embracing the dead person in a dream indicates the arrival of the absent or Reconciliation with others. What is the interpretation of a dream about a stranger hugging one person? Embracing an unwanted person indicates improved circumstances between them and an increase in the bonds of familiarity and affection.
